wikipedia_page.main: Jonathan "Jonny" Stewart (born 12 February 1990) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Bonnyrigg Rose Athletic in the Scottish Junior Football Association, East Region. He has previously played in the Scottish Premier League for Heart of Midlothian and in the Scottish Professional Football League for several clubs.

response: *Johnny Stewart (rugby union) (born 1998), Irish rugby union player
